title: A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
message:
This Macbook air just comes to me.
It load OS X and screen look ok. Problems is trackpad and keyboard are not working.
I connected USB mouse and it is not working too.
No way to boot ASD.
Any idea where to start?

title: A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
message: Yes, start to run away really fast from this pile of garbage. Do not even touch it, return to sender.

title: A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
message: i got a pile of laptops from a customer 3x 2009 and 3 x2011 they are sitting in a box untouched waiting for the customer to pick up

title: A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
message: i suggest taking dukes advice, im still a noob

title: A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
message: All these MCP79u boards are garbage. There are no new chipsets for them, so there isn't much to be done. Even if it is not a chipset issue now, it will be in a month when it beeps.

title: A1304 mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
message: Ok, that is what I want to know. MCP problems. Thanks
